Description:
Storybook Charm
Radiating character and charm, this Clifton Springs home will tug at the heartstrings, while offering convenient and practical living.
First impressions are lasting and, in this instance, will leave your wanting more. A private and secure fence allowing you to enjoy the manicured front garden, with a full-length verandah and front alfresco.
Neat as a pin, the kitchen is equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage overlooking the dining area. A separate living with an inviting gas feature fire completes the fore of the home. 3 bedrooms sit from the central hallway; master with walk-in-robe and ensuite, with built-in-robes in the remaining 2 bedrooms. The rear of the home hosts a sundrenched 2nd living and study nook, which effortlessly flows through to a fully enclosed outdoor deck; the perfect space to bask in the sun and enjoy the enviable northern aspect. The central family bathroom with shower, bath and feature vanity, separate toilet and laundry with outdoor entry complete this ideal package.
Manicured gardens both front and back offer a wealth of options to sit and enjoy your morning coffee in your own private oasis.
Additional features include heating and cooling, character features throughout, 602m2 parcel, tandem carport and an oversized single garage a higher than usual entry.
Located in a peaceful pocket of Clifton Springs, you're only minutes away from all amenities, public transport, schools and cafes. Make your Bellarine move today and enjoy everything that we have to offer!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Impressive Proportions. Impeccable Presentation
PLEASE CONTACT NIKOLETT PESTI FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Delivering the absolute epitome of success in the exclusive Bellrise Park Estate,this amazing family home is certain to impress. Beautifully presented throughout, this is a home where your family will be happy for many years to come.
In an obvious commitment to quality and attention to detail, light filled stylish and sophisticated interior spaces feature premium fittings, fixture and finishes throughout a brilliant and clever array of living, accommodation and entertainment options.
Upon entry you have a definite feeling of space with widened hallway & raised ceilings. Accommodation for the property comprises of a large master bedroom with walk in robe and dual vanity ensuite complete with oversized shower.
The living space of this home is extraordinary both in size and layout, consisting of a huge central family room showcasing a superb fish tank which you could admire for hours, and a separate rumpus/theatre room creates the ultimate zone for the largest of families.
The central hub of the home is not only a perfect combination of space and exquisite style, it is one of the warmest and most appealing spaces you could imagine, an extremely generous kitchen with central breakfast bar, pot draws, dishwasher, 900mm oven, stone bench tops along with a walk in pantry.
Towards the rear of the home you enter into the third living area, currently set up as the kids rumpus. You will also find three further bedrooms all with built in robes and complemented by the family bathroom which feature a separate shower and bathtub.
Taking the property to another level is the outdoor living and entertaining in the very best way possible, an enormous mix of lounge and dining space with outdoor blinds right around providing the ultimate in style and enjoyment.
Offering everything a large family could need all on a brilliant 832sqm allotment, the home offers a double remote garage with internal access plus the side space for trailer parking.
Extras include- gas ducted heating, solar hot water, downlights, large timber deck, garden sheds, well maintained front yard and backyard, quality blinds, carpets, light fittings and much more.
The location enjoys a gentle stroll to the open parkland, Estuary Sporting Reserve- a full size football oval and soccer pitch is only 600m away. Easy access to the expanded Gateway Shopping Plaza which features cafes, eateries, big brand stores and medical facility. The local Primary School & Kindergarten are also at easy reach. Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer are only a short fifteen-minute drive away making the property the blend of space and convenience.

Description:
Entry Level Buying with Phenomenal Garaging!
Set within a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs and being only a 5-minute walk to the Bay, this entry level home offers something that none of the others have
The home is set behind a private and secure fence, with established gardens offering a tranquil front court yard. A high double carport leads through to the expansive 7 x 5.6m garage, which then offers a further 3 workshops/sheds - perfect for those wanting secure storage for multiple cars, caravans, boat or the perfect man cave!
The home itself is quaint, with warming and inviting timber hardwood floors. A spacious open living area flows effortlessly into the fully equipped kitchen with SS electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage and bench space, which overlooks the meals area. 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes, refurbished central family bathroom, laundry, separate toilet, and sunroom complete this neat and practical abode.
Additional features of the home include, 5kw Solar Panels, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans and garden sheds.
The back garden is low maintenance with a grassed area, with scope to further personalise and make your own all upon a generous 587m2 parcel.
With all major amenities, public transport, schools and shops only moments away, this is your chance to secure a slice of the Bellarine, whether it's your first home, investment, holiday home or a downsize.

Description:
DOUBLE BLOCK! POOL AND UNIT! ALL OFFERS CONSIDERED!
Enviable central Drysdale position, loads of space and extra generous proportions here at no. 45. The facade is wrapped by a wide verandah and mature gardens. Enter through the wide ornate front door to a gracious entry hallway and double glass period doors through to the formal lounge room. The spacious kitchen features solid Blackwood timber cabinetry, St George double oven & DW with dining area and second adjacent living room. Three generous bedrooms, BIR'S in main, plus study or fourth bedroom. Central bathroom, shower combined with laundry and separate toilet. The self contained unit has kitchen, bathroom, living and bedroom with access to the rear gardens and separate external access to the front of the property.
Features include period dado, high ceilings, central heating and cooling, space heater, instant gas HWS, as new colorbond roofing, 2 x 30,000lt water tanks and 5 minutes stroll to the centre of Drysdale. The double access allows for 4 vehicles as well as caravan and/or boat space, workshop option. Still plenty of room for the pool with the rambling gardens adding seclusion and privacy. A fantastic central Drysdale property!

Description:
This Won't Last Long!!
PLEASE CONTACT GEORGE POLITIS FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Situated in the ever-popular Estuary Estate this beautifully presented property has just turned five and ready for its next owner. Upon inspection, you will be impressed with the quality and extras this property offers. this abode makes an affordable starter, impeccable downsizer or lucrative investment opportunity.
Landscaped gardens welcome you to the home, whereupon stepping inside, modern interiors finished in a neutral palette are revealed. An inviting open plan family and meals area flow effortlessly to the gourmet kitchen. Designed to please the Masterchef within, the kitchen boasts stone benchtops, gas cooking and a walk-in pantry. Fire up the barbie and enjoy Friday night drinks while you watch the kids and pets roam around with beautiful views of Geelong.
The master suite is a private sanctuary serviced by a walk-in robe and a deluxe ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms share an elegant family bathroom complete with a shower, bath and a separate toilet. Two of the bedrooms feature built-in robes whilst the fourth bedroom can also be used as a rumpus.
Occupying an easy care 448m2 block, other premium features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling and double lock-up garage with internal access.
Estuary Estate is renowned for its sporting fields and clubs, beautiful reserves and walkways. Serviced by public transport, the home is also accessible to the Geelong CBD, Bellarine and local beaches. The home is also moments to local schools and shops with a Bunnings up the road and the Gateway Plaza shopping centre.
Near new, there's nothing left to do but move-in or rent out. Priced to meet the market, this one will sell fast. Call now to arrange an inspection today.
Rental potential $430-$450pw.

Ready to unlock big value.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Perfect for the savvy first home buyer seeking an affordable entry in to the Leopold market place or the astute investor seeking big returns. Situated on a corner allotment of approx. 586m2 the options are endless including renovation/extension or subdivision (STCA).
Consisting of three bedrooms all with BIR's, central bathroom, open plan living, kitchen and dining area leading you to the outdoor entertaining area. Features include gas heater, dishwasher, instant gas hot water and double car garage with workshop.
Within close proximity to the ever expanding Leopold Gateway Plaza, public transport, quality schools, parks and walking tracks. Also close to the Geelong CBD & stunning Waterfront, ensuring a very convenient lifestyle.

Description:
Immaculate Presentation On Large Block
The Feel:
Situated in one of Central Walk's elevated pockets, this 4-bedroom family home presents as new. Immaculately presented, the floorplan provides dual living areas, zoned sleeping quarters & a versatile study. Protected outdoor living capitalises on the west orientation, seamlessly connecting the indoors & outdoors via a corner sliding door system. The large lawn offers bountiful space for play, while parks & wetlands provide a lovely family friendly setting, conveniently located just 800m from the local school & shops.
The Facts:
-Quality custom-built brick veneer residence by local Boutique Homes
-Highly regarded Central Walk estate boasts stunning parklands; new park opposite coming soon
-Spacious well-proportioned open plan living, meals & kitchen with high ceilings
-Inviting wide entry with dark stained oak timber laminate floors throughout & carpet to bedrooms
-Modern kitchen with clean lines, caesarstone waterfall island bench & WIP
-Stainless steel Ilve appliances (900mm oven, 6 burner gas hob), DW & dbl fridge cavity
-Sunny living & meals area connects seamlessly to outdoor area via corner sliding door system
-Covered alfresco area with merbau deck - a great space for entertaining
-Fully fenced yard with large lawn for kids & pets & low maintenance boundary plantings
-Brivis ducted heating throughout, SSAC to main living, & ceiling fans in all bedrooms
-Spacious Master bedroom with commanding north position, TV point & WIR
-Luxury en-suite with double rain shower, twin vanities, stone bench & separate toilet
-Zoned wing to 3 more bedrooms & central bathroom (vanity, deep tub, shower, sep toilet)
-Versatile 2nd living/rumpus/media room with east aspect further endorses family-friendly design
-Dedicated Study buds off hallway, with sunny west aspect
-Elevated corner position with big sky outlook, mature treed surrounds & landscaped garden
-Exposed aggregate driveway to RC DLUG with internal & rear yard access
-3mins drive to cafes & shops, 800m to Drysdale PS, 500m to Rail Trail
The Owner Loves....
We love the palpable sense of space that we have from this raised position on a corner block. Theres nothing better than relaxing on the deck in the afternoon sun, with a huge gum tree across the road provides a beautiful outlook. Soon there will be a brand new playground on the reserve, which the kids will love!

Description:
Modern family home in quiet street
Positioned in a quiet street, this 4-bedroom rendered brick home provides a great opportunity for low-maintenance, comfortable living. With neutral tones throughout, and a flexible floor plan, this property is ready to move in and make your own. Conveniently located close to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, schools and green spaces, it also enjoys easy access to Geelong's CBD and the many attractions of the Bellarine Peninsula.
The master bedroom captures the morning sun and comes with ample WIR, ensuite and handy study nook. Bedrooms 2 and 3 offer built-in robes, with the 4th bedroom at the front of the house having the versatility to convert into a second living space or home office. The home's bright main bathroom has a bath, shower, vanity and separate WC.
Modern and functional, the open-plan kitchen features stainless steel appliances - Omega oven, cooktop and dishwasher - and plenty of storage. The stone island bench with breakfast bar overlooks the dining area, main living zone and out onto the undercover alfresco with hardy concrete flooring; an ideal space for entertaining in any weather. The laundry off to the side has under-sink storage and direct access to the clothesline. Outdoors, the backyard contains low maintenance garden beds with pittosporums creating a leafy privacy screen, and a sun-dappled area to enjoy a morning coffee. A thriving gum tree takes centre place in the front yard, as well as a manageable patch of lawn.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system A/C and double garage with internal access. For comfortable living in a relaxed area with easy access to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula, arrange an inspection today!
- Spacious master bedroom with ensuite, ample WIR & study nook
- Modern open-plan living space with adjoining alfresco
- Gas ducted heating & split system AC provide climate control
- Double lock-up garage with internal access
- Quiet location near the Bellarine Rail Trail & green spaces
- Close to Gateway Plaza/schools, with easy access to Geelong

Description:
RENOVATED, 2 LIVING AREAS, AFFORDABLE
With all the hard work already done, this charming abode will impress from the moment of entry. Deceiving from the front, a contemporary and sleek refurbishment offers a neutral palette, enriched with gorgeous timber tones that run throughout.
Streaming with natural light, this home offers a completely relaxed feel that will have you feeling at home immediately. Free flowing, the huge kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, ample storage and breakfast bench for informal dining, with a separate formal dining area and open plan living with split system heating and cooling. 3 generous size bedrooms all offer built-in-robes, the master also comprising split system and are serviced by a chic bathroom with free standing tub, timber vanity, shower and herringbone feature tiles offering a true luxe vibe. A relaxed 2nd living space sits at the rear, with the fully equipped laundry, 2nd bathroom and separate toilet completing this ready to move in abode!
Outside is low maintenance with dual sheds and gated side access for secure parking, also encompassing an open grassed area. Located within a private, no through access road, the utmost privacy and secure living is on offer, all sitting pretty on 582m2 corner block.
Schools, public transport, supermarket, shops and all major amenities on offer are at your fingertips and our world class wineries, eateries, Golf Clubs and of course our beautiful Bay only minutes away, this is a rare and affordable entry into the booming Bellarine market!

Description:
An Abundance of Natural Light in Charming Renovation
Sitting on a generous 675sqm allotment is this well-presented home which has been the recent recipient of a charming renovation throughout. With a copious amount of natural sunlight coming through to the open plan kitchen, living and dining from the North this home boasts the type of property that is often sought after but rarely found.
The loving renovation leaves nothing for the astute purchaser to do. Whether you're a first home buyer, investor or simply looking for your new home, this property gives the perfect opportunity to simply move in and enjoy the lifestyle the area has to offer.
Three generously proportioned bedrooms all with built-in robes
Open plan kitchen, living and dining with North facing sun
Kitchen features stone benchtop and stainless-steel appliances
Hardwood floorboards throughout, near new tiling to wet areas
Plenty of storage throughout, great sized laundry
Mature gardens to front and rear, spacious rear yard
Undercover carport and lock-up garage to rear
Short walk to Ash Road Cafes and Leopold Primary School
Five minutes to Gateway Plaza Leopold

Description:
Stylish New Single Level Townhouse
This home is currently available to inspect by Virtual Tour or by Private Inspections, please contact agent for further information
Overlooking a park and situated on the corner of a quiet street in Drysdale is a brand, spanking new single-level townhouse. Showcasing contemporary flair and charcoal tones throughout, there is a slick feel to this property.
At the front of the residence is the bright and open living and dining hub that flows out to a courtyard. The kitchen boasts stone bench tops, island breakfast bar, Smeg appliances, textured white subway splashback and ample cabinetry.
Along the hallway there is access to a double lock-up garage and generous linen press. Up two steps to a carpeted slumber zone consisting of three queen size bedrooms, two with built-in robes and master with a walk-in and en suite.
The hotel-style bathroom pulses sophistication with a soaker tub, vanity, speckled concrete tiles and shower. Extra touches include a full laundry, separate toilet, water tank servicing toilets, double glazed windows, block-out blinds and refrigerated zoned cooling and heating.
With this kind of location the lucky owners will be walking to the shops, cafes, heart of town and schools. A perfect downsizer, first-home purchase or addition to a property portfolio. Call Richard for an inspection today!
- Brand new stylish and light townhouse in Drysdale
- Three queen size bedrooms, master with an en suite and WIR
- Low maintenance residence close to shops, schools and cafes
- Ideal downsizer, first-home or savvy investment
- Double lock-up garage, refrigerated cooling and heating
- Only five minutes from beaches and 20 minutes drive into Geelong

Description:
QUIET COURT LOCATION
State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies.
We regret that residents from Metropolitan Melbourne or Mitchell Shire must not attend an open for inspection at this stage. Please contact the agent to organise a virtual inspection.
We are all looking for a quiet life at the moment and what better than a court location. Close to all major amenities in Leopold including all you need to work, rest and play.
Lounge, Kitchen, meals and main bedroom overlook north facing U-shaped decking. Winter warmth through the expansive glass windows, clerestory windows and doors.
Currently leased until March 2021 with fantastic tenants who look after the home as if it is their own. This would be an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
The Bellarine Peninsula is an area of choice to live as people move to regional locations and choose to work remotely during this interesting time. It is predicted that working remotely will be an ongoing option even when we can return to some semblance of normality.
A minimum of twenty four hours' notice is required for inspections due to being tenanted.

Description:
An Irresistible Family Lifestyle Awaits
Offering a second to none view in one of the most sought-after locations in Leopold, this home is sure to tick the boxes for any first home buyers, occupiers as well as astute investors. Boasting tastefully renovated interiors, four spacious bedrooms, a large traditional rear yard all situated all on a great sized 674sqm approx. allotment, this home will leave you wanting nothing more.
The idea of quality family living is noticeable throughout as the home provides everything a growing family could need. Comprising of four great sized bedrooms, two separate living areas, multiple meals/dining areas that incorporate an abundance of natural sunlight that provides a seamless connection to the outdoor entertainment area.
Four spacious bedrooms, two with walk-in robes
Master has ensuite with double shower and walk-in robes
Provisions for second ensuite to bedroom two
Tastefully renovated throughout, near new bathrooms
Kitchen has stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops
Upstairs suite has a built-in study flooded with natural light
Hardwood floorboards throughout, carpet to upstairs suite
Ducted heating, split system cooling and ceiling fans throughout
Quality decking to alfresco opens to traditional rear yard

Description:
Peaceful, private and spacious.
Located in a prime pocket of Leopold, this custom-built family home is perfect for those who are on the hunt for a quality home that that doesn't compromise on space. This beautiful double-storey residence stands tall, and captures stunning views over Geelong, while being close to the shops, adjacent to local parkland and just a 15 minute drive to Geelong.
Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 4 Living areas, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, a study, and a private and secure backyard, this property offers great value for money in today's market.
At the heart of the home, the expansive, open plan kitchen features quality cabinetry, gas and electric appliances and overlooks the living and dining area which opens out to a large alfresco perfect for year-round entertaining. A large living area to the front of the home offers walk in storage for all the kid's toys and is adjacent to a fantastic rumpus/billiard room with dedicated gym room complete with rubber flooring.
Upstairs, the luxurious main bedroom offers a walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity. The remaining 3 bedrooms all feature built in robes and study desks, all serviced by a large central bathroom with separate toilet. A west-facing deck makes great use of the elevated position and captures beautiful views over the region.
Notable features include:
- 2 x Split system air conditioning
- Gas central heating
- Evaporative cooling
- 5kw PV Solar System
- Oversized double garage with rear roller door access to the backyard
- Large laundry with great storage and W/C
This exceptional property is located across the road from the local park, just a short stroll to public transport, a 3-minute drive to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and all of its fine wineries, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!

Large family home!
Set high upon the hill in the exclusive Bellrise Park Estate, this huge family home is perfect for multi-generational living with the addition of a guest bedroom with ensuite on the ground level. The expansive open-plan kitchen/dining/living cater easily for the masses, and extend even further onto the north-facing alfresco.
Upstairs you'll find a master suite fit for king and queen, another supersized living space and three further bedrooms that share a bathroom with dual vanity and separate toilet.
You're going to love being so close to Gateway Plaza, and watching the sensational sunsets from your own balcony off the master suite.

Description:
A rare offering
Set on a perfectly positioned 1980m2 (approx.) in the heart of the idyllic rural community of Ceres, this unique family home needs to be seen to be appreciated. Ceres sits atop the beautiful Barrabool Hills, just beyond neighbouring Highton, and has its own fascinating history. The township features traditional sandstone buildings, a primary school, sporting facilities and is just a short drive to the Ring Road and ever-popular Highton shopping and cafe precinct. The home is surrounded in secluded privacy thanks to the established trees, lawn and gardens providing the perfect place to relax, escape life's hustle and bustle and enjoy the quiet tranquillity of village life. The home boasts four bedrooms, a master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, a home office, two bathrooms, multiple living and entertaining zones and a separate laundry. Outside you will find a swimming pool, an undercover outdoor entertaining area, a double garage which is currently being used as a gym and a further four car garage. An inspection is a must.
For more information on this property text '6 Thomas' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Panoramic views of Corio Bay
Imagine watching the ships ply their cargo up the shipping lanes from the moment you wake up. Offering panoramic views of the You Yangs from the commanding front undercover deck.
Spacious formal lounge with split system air conditioner & ceiling fan.
This well presented family home offers four comfortable bedrooms plus a study.
The near new kitchen with stone benchtops, oodles of draws & opaque cupboards & servery window will delight the avid chef. The five burner gas cook-top, stainless steel feature rangehood & dishwasher.
Imagine waking up in the generous master bedroom with great views of the water through plantation shutters.
A split system air conditioner & fan in the master bedroom for that perfect environment.
Large family room with vaulted ceilings, built in entertainment / display cabinet, library cabinet & easy access to the backyard.
The bathrooms have been beautifully renovated with stylish floor to ceiling tiles, large shower head & doorless entry to the shower.
The under cover timber deck over looks the back yard, with plenty of yard to play.
Separate large rumpus room would ideally suit a craft home gym needing space.
Ducted central floor heating throughout to ward away the winter chills.
Single garage would be ideally suited to a workshop or mancave.
Double gates & a long side drive allowing storage of boat or caravan behind double gates.
Close to the Clifton Springs Bowls & Golf Course, easy access to the Primary School. This is the lifestyle waiting for you.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle by the Sea
Move to the coast and enjoy all what the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer, sit back and relax from the living area and decked alfresco enjoying the water views across Corio Bay.
With multiple beaches only 1km to Ocean Grove only 14km away. Beachside living at its best, with four double bedrooms, three living zones, two bathrooms and all amenities only minutes away, the beautiful Geelong City Centre only 17km.
With a wide entrance at the front there is a large study or third living room with leads to the master ensuite with twin vanity, modern shower with adjustable rail, tiled niche, and tiled show base.
At the heart of the home is the spacious open plan living spaces, kitchen with 900mm oven/cooktop and dishwasher, stone benchtops, glass splashback, huge double fridge/freezer space with water point, large pantry and an abundance of storage.
Highlights include:
Ducted heating and ducted cooling for the entire house
Huge alfresco and decked backyard
Wide frontage with two driveways, perfect to store a caravan or boat, plus double gate to the rear yard.
Double lock up garage with rear roller door to concreted area
Elevated North facing rear yard to enjoy the amazing views across Corio Bay.
Outdoor shower

Description:
An Effortless Lifestyle Awaits In Leopold!
Whether youre an astute investor, young family, or simply looking for a low-maintenance lifestyle without compromising on space, this home is the one for you!
The local sporting grounds and playground with BBQ facilities are a short walk from your front door - providing plenty of outdoor areas for everyone to enjoy. Public transport is also within walking distance, while the Gateway Plaza and Gateway Sanctuary are wonderfully close by. Young families will enjoy easy access to Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Hub.
Glossy floor tiles and square-set ceilings enhance the interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone establishes the heart of the home while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for modern-day living or casual gatherings with loved ones.
The kitchen features black stone benchtops, a large walk-in pantry, and an island bench/breakfast bar. Stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, and canopy rangehood.
Zoned to the front of the home, the lounge creates another generous spot for either relaxation or play. With both the lounge and front entrance able to be sectioned off from the main living zone, this room will also appeal to home business owners.
Two bedrooms with built-in robes complete the lower level, along with the main bathroom, powder room, and laundry with ample storage.
Upstairs, the study nook opens onto a balcony that captures west-facing views over Geelong what better way to unwind at the end of a day than by watching the sunset!
The Master Bedroom is graced with views, a walk-in robe, and en suite with large shower, single vanity, and toilet.
Ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners keep you comfortable all year long.
The secure backyard provides a private play space for young children or pets. A rainwater tank helps to keep the easy-care gardens in tip-top condition. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus access to storage under the staircase. Investors will appreciate that the home is currently tenanted.
When it comes to effortless living, this home packs a punch! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Looking For The Perfect Family Home?
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace the family lifestyle youve been craving! Showcasing stylish interiors, a sun-drenched alfresco deck and backyard vehicle access, this home is simply irresistible!
Positioned in a family-friendly pocket of Leopold, this location will leave you wanting nothing. A short stroll will find you at the Bellarine Rail Trail or Hoddle Drive Playground, where you can enjoy some outdoor family fun. Public transport is within easy walking distance, while both Leopold Sportsmans Club and the Gateway Plaza are close by. Easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub and the Leopold Library will delight families. To top it all off, the Portarlington Highway grants access to the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula.
Showcasing contemporary style, the interiors exude a calming ambience throughout the home. With both the lounge and open plan living zone capturing the northern light, an enticing setting is created for everyday living. The lounge provides the perfect spot to relax or can even be set up as the ultimate kids retreat. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the backyard and alfresco deck via glass stacker doors. Complete with a built-in bench, youll love that you can kick back on the deck with friends as the kids play in the secure backyard. The picture-perfect kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, a walk-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the dreamy Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with large shower, dual vanity and toilet. Three additional bedrooms boast built-in robes. The main bathroom, laundry with external access, and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while secure side vehicle access provides additional vehicle storage perfect for caravans, boats or trailers!
With the elements in place for fine family living, youll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!
